info.description: HarvestMan is a modular, extensible and flexible web crawler program cum framework written in pure Python. HarvestMan? can be used to download files from websites according to a number of customized rules and constraints. It can be used to find information from websites matching keywords or regular expressions.
info.keywords: crawler spider web-crawler web-bot robot data-mining python
info.name: HarvestMan
info.summary: HarvestMan is a web crawler application and framework.
